title: North Belfast: Graffiti treated as a sectarian hate crime
title_page: North Belfast: Graffiti treated as a sectarian hate crime - BBC News
maintext: The North Belfast MLA added: "I am calling on public representatives for the area to speak with one voice against those determined to drag us down the cul-de-sac of hatred and fear."
